extendedInfo.description: This Application could be used to get all hardware information from a device.This application contents several different tools:-Sensor list-Screen description (refresh rate, resolution,..)-Camera features description-BlueTooth features description (MAC address, bonded devices, ...)-Battery description (voltage, temperature, ...)-Processor description (Core number, frequency, version, ...)-Memory description (free memory, SD card, ...)-Operating System description (Android version, ...)
